author: MIT OpenCourseWare
description:
MIT 14.01 Principles of Microeconomics, Fall 2023 
Instructor: Prof. Jonathan Gruber 
View the complete course: ocw.mit.edu/courses/14-01-principles-of-microeconomics-spring-2023/
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP60V7HxLYRaJMbFzP77bzEjb

*Note: video revised to show the proper figure discussing isoquants at 24:55  (Figure 5.3)*

In this lecture, Prof. Gruber talks about the production function, short-run production, long-run production, returns to scale, and productivity. Keywords: productivity, short run, long run, returns to scale, production function

title: Lec 5: Production Theory

author: MIT OpenCourseWare
description:
MIT Economist Andrew W. Lo explains what motivated him to see Finance as a tool for public good, from the development of life-saving drugs, to counteracting the effects of Climate Change.

View the full conversation ➜ https://youtu.be/8kFFg5jAoQc?si=YbqBYKYedxa3Fna8

The Chalk Radio® Podcast ➜ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8kFFg5jAoQc&list=PLUl4u3cNGP63YwKIMA9K08FFvdeBEl6Lo&pp=gAQB
title: Finance for public good
